      static int toInteger(boolean bool)

      • valueOf

        public static boolean valueOf(int number)
        Converts a primitive integer to boolean by assuming 0 is false and everything else (1) is true.
        Parameters:
        number -
        Returns:
        true or false based on the input

      • valueOf

        public static java.lang.Boolean valueOf(java.lang.Integer value)
        Converts an Integer object to Boolean by assuming 0 is false and everything else (1) is true. If the parameter is null then it returns null.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
        null if the parameter is null, true or false otherwise.

      • toInteger

        public static int toInteger(boolean bool)
        Converts a primitive boolean to a primitive integer by assuming 0 is false and everything else (1) is true.
        Parameters:
        bool -
        Returns:
        0 if the parameter is false, 1 otherwise.

      • toInteger

        public static java.lang.Integer toInteger(java.lang.Boolean bool)
        Converts a Boolean object to an Integer by assuming 0 is false and everything else (1) is true. If the parameter is null then it returns null.
        Parameters:
        bool -
        Returns:
        null if the parameter is null, 0 if false, 1 if true.

      • valueOf

        public static java.lang.Boolean valueOf(java.lang.String value)
        Converts a String object to Boolean by assuming the following mappings:

        '0' -> false, 'no' -> false, '1' -> true, 'yes' -> true

        Equality is checked in a case insensitive manner. If the parameter is null or something else than ['0', '1', 'yes', 'no'] then it returns null.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
        null if the parameter is null or the value is not in '0', '1', 'yes', 'no', true or false otherwise.

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Boolean bool)
        Converts a Boolean object to String by assuming '0' is false and '1' is true. If the parameter is null then it returns null.
        Parameters:
        bool -
        Returns:
        null if the parameter is null, '0' if false, '1' if true.

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(boolean bool)
        Converts a primitive boolean to String by assuming '0' is false and '1' is true.
        Parameters:
        bool -
        Returns:
        '0' if the parameter is false, '1' otherwise.

      • toYesOrNoString

        public static java.lang.String toYesOrNoString(java.lang.Boolean bool)
        Converts a Boolean object to String by assuming 'no' is false and 'yes' is true. If the parameter is null then it returns null.
        Parameters:
        bool -
        Returns:
        null if the parameter is null, 'no' if false, 'yes' if true.

      • toYesOrNoString

        public static java.lang.String toYesOrNoString(boolean bool)
        Converts a primitive boolean to String by assuming 'no' is false and 'yes' is true.
        Parameters:
        bool -
        Returns:
        'no' if the parameter is false, 'yes' otherwise.
